---
title: "SPP for C"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
C <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/C.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
c <- ts(C[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2017+223.50/365.25)
c %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(c))
```

```{r}
training_c <- subset(c, end=length(c)-3)
test_c <- subset(c, start=length(c)-2)
fc_training_c<-forecast(training_c)
fc_training_c %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_c)
```

```{r}
fc_training_c
```

```{r}
fc_c<-forecast(c)
fc_c %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_c
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_c)
```

```{r}
tail(c)
min(c)
max(c)
which.min(c)
```
